alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 11 at 5:22PM CDT until June 11 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL CRITTENDEN...DESOTO AND SOUTHWESTERN SHELBY COUNTIES... At 522 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near T O Fuller State Park, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southaven, Olive Branch, West Memphis, Horn Lake, Hernando, T O Fuller State Park, Memphis, Walls, Southwest Memphis, Lynchburg, Lewisburg, Whitehaven, Cockrum, Cedarview, Bright, Amanea, Nesbit, Handy Corner, Wyandoke and Capleville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
